Daisuke Ishiwatari, (a mụrụ na 14 Ọgọst 1973 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye South Africa- Japanese ne-emepụta egwuregwu vidiyo, onye ngọsị, ọgụ egwu, ochepụta egwu na onye ome ejije olu.
Ishiwatari rụrụ ọrụ na Arc System Works na Guilty Gear mbụ ozugbo ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Daisuke, ya na Yoshihiro Kusano, dekwara egwu maka BlazBlue, yana ise ihe osise nke nhọrọ njirimara maka ihe na-esote, BlazBlue: Continuum Shift
Tinyere nke a, o dekwara maka Hard Corps: Uprising
A makwaara Daisuke Ishiwatari dịka onye na-ede egwu na ụdị metal na rock
Ihe ndị o dere, nke a chọtara na usoro akara ya, Guilty Gear, gosipụtara ọrụ guitar dị mgbagwoju anya, dịka ihe ndị o dere na BlazBlue
Abọm Guilty Gear XX na LA na Guilty GearXX na NY gụnyere olu maka egwu ahọpụtara, dịka abọm atọ na Japanese site na otu Lapis Lazuli.
